title: View an existing Elect Free Agency transaction
custom_preconds: Given there is an existing Elect Free Agency Tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in view mode

title: Submitting an elect free agency to the BOC for approval to add to the Player's History
custom_preconds: Given an Elect Free Agency tx has been created
custom_steps: When clicking Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN a blue notification will display
AND on the player's Player History the entry will be displayed in green font

title: Create a new Elect Free Agency tx for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Elect Free Agency" from the "Create New" menu
custom_expected: THEN the system will load a new Preliminary tx

title: Club user is prevented from initiating an Elect Free Agency tx for a player that does not belong to the Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a club user
AND player does not belong to users club
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Elect Free Agency"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization.", "If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."

title: Receive an error if the player attempting to create an elect free agency tx is not on a roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a club user
AND player does not belong to any club
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Elect Free Agency"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: Submit an elect free agency to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an "Elect Free Agency" Transaction has been created
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the system will set the player's pending Org and Club to NULL
AND the system will set the player's pending Major League Rosters status to "Free Agent"

title: Elect Free Agency Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND on an "Elect Free Agency"
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Elect Free AGency" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can View and Print all MJ tx in all states
AND view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions
BUT a BOC Basic users can only view, print, and see flags

title: Elect Free Agency - Club - Major Transactions (ADMIN)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB ADMIN
AND on an "Elect Free Agency" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Elect Free AGency" tx
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view and print all major league transactions in all states of their own Org/Club
AND can view all approved MJ tx, including other clubs 
AND can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT cannot view transaction in a suppressed state
AND cannot view "BOC Notes" field
AND cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Elect Free Agency - Club - Major Transactions (BASIC)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB BASIC
AND on an "Elect Free Agency" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Elect Free AGency" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all MJ tx in all states, when logged in Org matches the "From Org"
BUT cannot see suppressed tx
AND cannot edit or change tx
AND cannot see "BOC Notes" field

title: Error if the player I am creating an elect free agency for has a pending tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a pending tx
custom_steps:
WHEN creating an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND the assignment date is after the pending tx date
AND clicking Submit
custom_expected: THEN an error will display  "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if the player I am creating an elect free agency for has an approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a approved tx
custom_steps:
WHEN creating an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND the assignment date is after the pending tx date
AND clicking "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display  "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if back or future dated elect free agency's tx assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a "Elect Free Agency" tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the assignment date is is back or future dated more than 10 days
AND the user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error message will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: BOC Approver will receive an error if attempting to approve an elect free agency tx with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND the assignment date is after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: Error if attempting to Elect Free Agency under certain articles for a player playing at the Minor League Level (Has Pending Club)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND the "Election Under Article" field is set to either XXA2C- Non Tender, XXA2D- Failure to Renew, or XIX(C)(2)(a)(ii) AND the player has a Pending Club that is at the MN League Level
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: Error if attempting to Elect Free Agency under certain articles for a player playing at the Minor League Level (Does Not Have Pending Club)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND the "Election Under Article" field is set to Rejection of Waiver UR claim AND the player does not have a Pending or Actual MJ Roster Status of "Optioned" or "Released from Roster" AND has a Pending Clu that is at the MN League Level
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: Delete an elect free agency tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_steps:
WHEN the tx is in EDIT mode 
AND clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN the form should be closed and no record of the form should be kept
AND the user will be returned to the entry point of the tx

title: Error if attempting to elect a player under article XXB with an invalid election date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Election Under Article" is set to "XXB" 
AND the Election Date is before 
AND is no more than 5 days after the World Series End Date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Electing FA under XXB must be within 5 days of FA filing period (between {date 1} and {date 2})"

title: BOC user can approve an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx 
AND is in view or edit mode in a state of Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to "Approved"
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's MJR or MNR status is set to Free Agent
AND the player's Org and Club is set to Null

title: BOC user can reject an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx 
AND is in a state, Submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry.

title: Approving an elect free agency transaction will add the transaction to the Player's History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a "Elect Free Agency" tx
AND is in the state "Submitted to BOC"
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the system creates an entry in player's Player History in black font
AND shows the subsequent code based on the type of "Elected From Article" field choice

title: Edit an existing elect free agency transaction for a player (Club)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an existing elect free agency transaction
AND user is a Club user
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking edit
AND the tx is in Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_expected:
THEN Club user will be able to edit all portions displayed on the form
AND edit only gives clubs access to attach new files in any state other than Preliminary or Rejected
AND Club cannot edit existing attachments or any other part of transaction.
BUT Club users should NOT have any edit permissions for Elect Free Agency transactions with a BOC-only selection for the "Election Under Article" field in ANY state

title: Edit an existing elect free agency transaction for a player (BOC)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an existing elect free agency transaction
AND user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking edit
AND the tx is in Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user will be able to edit all portions displayed on the form
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in the all states except for Approved and Reversed tx
AND In Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND can also update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
BUT cannot edit any other part of transaction

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reverse an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an elect free agency tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN a reverse notification will display
AND the tx status will update to "Reversed"
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to suppress an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an elect free agency tx in a Reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will be suppress
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reverse and suppress an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an elect free agency tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse and Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will first reverse, and then be suppressed
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: Club user will receive a notification when my elect free agency transaction is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a CLUB user
AND there is an existing tx that has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the tx has been Approved, Rejected or Reversed
custom_expected:
THEN the club will receive a notification when the transaction is updated to Approved, Rejected or Reversed
AND the Description will be a hyperlink to the tx

title: BOC user while approving an elect free agency will expire a player's major league contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is a Elect Free Agency tx pending approval
custom_steps: WHEN approving the tx
custom_expected:
THEN the player's current MJC will expire
AND player's current major contract status updates to 'Expired'
AND an automatic comment generated on the contract (should not overwrite existing text but add to existing text). 
        "Expired by [username] on [date, time stamp] via [transaction name - article name]"

title: BOC user can reverse an elect free agency transaction to un-expire any major league contracts that were expired as a result of the elect free agency transaction being approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND there is an Elect Free Agency tx in Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN the state of the tx is moved to Reversed
custom_expected:
THEN the MJC that was marked Expired as a result of the approval of the tx will "unexpire"
AND the state of the major league contract will be returned to its previous state

title: View an existing Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window

title: BOC user is able to create a new Sign to Major League Roster transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Sign Free Agent" from the Create New
custom_expected: THEN check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Sign to Major League Roster transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date

title: Club user can see Sign to Major League Roster greyed out in the Create New map for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a club user
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Sign Free Agent"
custom_expected: THEN users should not be allowed to select this option from the Create New map

title: Submit a sign to major league roster to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking submit
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND if transaction was manually created, set player’s pending major Roster status to “Active Pending Contract” and set pending minor roster status to Null
AND if transaction was auto-created by system, set player's pending major Roster status to "Active" and pending minor roster status to Null.
AND Set the player’s pending org and pending club to the Signing Org

title: Error if back or future dated sign to ML roster assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a created Sign Free Agent tx
custom_steps:
WHEN back or future dating the "sign to date" more than 10 days
AND clicking Submit or Approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Signing Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Warning if the Major League active or under control limit will be exceeded with this sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Sign to major league roster tx
AND the transaction will put the relevant Major League Org over their under control or active roster limits
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN an error will display "The club [Major League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
 
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"

title: Error if creating a sign to ML roster transaction for does not have a valid MJ or MN roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a a status of Free Agent or Released
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Player to be signed is not a Free Agent, or is not Released."

title: Error if creating a sign to major league roster has a pending or approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a sign to major league roster tx
AND the signing date is before the latest approved or pending transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display  "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Sign to Major League Roster Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_expected:
THEN the ADMIN can view and print all major tx in all states
AND view all flags for all transactions
AND create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all MJ tx
AND Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all MJ tx
BUT Basic can only view, print, and view flags

title: Sign to Major League Roster Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (BASIC)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a CLUB user (Basic)
custom_steps: WHEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all MJ tx in all states when logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that tx
AND can view all approved MJ tx including other club's 
BUT cannot see Suppressed tx
AND cannot edit or change tx
AND cannot see BOC notes
AND cannot see comments fields for other clubs

title: Sign to Major League Roster Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (ADMIN)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is a CLUB user (ADMIN)
custom_steps: WHEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all MJ tx in all states that the Org matches the "From Org"
AND can view all approved MJ tx for other clubs
BUT cannot see BOC notes field
AND cannot see Suppressed tx
AND cannot see attached files section for other clubs

title: BOC user can approve a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
AND the tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to Approved
AND a blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed form the Approvals Clipboard
AND the player's Player History will update Code = SGNFA, Description = Sign Free Agent to Major League Roster, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to black font
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to to “Active Pending Contract”. 
BUt if this transaction is auto-created, set MJ Roster status to “Active”
ANd set the player's MN Roster Status to null.
AND set the player's Org and Club to the Signing Org

title: As a BOC user can reject a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
AND the tx is in Submitted to BOC state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to Rejected
AND a reject notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the Approvals Clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status. 
AND remove pending player history entry.

title: Club user will receive a notification when my sign to major league roster is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN a Sign to Major League Roster tx is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification when the transaction is updated
AND the Description will be a hyperlink to the tx

title: BOC user can reverse and a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is a sign to major league roster tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN a reverse notification will display
AND the tx status will update to "Reversed"
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: BOC user can surpress a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is a sign to major league roster tx in a Reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will be suppress
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: BOC user can reverse and suppress a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is a sign to major league roster tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse and Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will first reverse, and then be suppressed
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: BOC Approver will receive an error if attempting to approve a sign to ML Roster transaction with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps:
WHEN the current date is before the assignment date entered on the transaction
AND clicking Approve
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: Delete a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Sign to Major League Roster" tx
AND is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_steps:
WHEN the tx is in EDIT mode 
AND clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN the form should be closed and no record of the form should be kept
AND the user will be returned to the entry point of the tx

title: Edit an existing sign to major league roster transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an existing Sign to Major League Roster tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking edit
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will reload in edit mode
AND in Preliminary and Reject states the user will be able to edit all portions of the form,  except for "Report Date" and "Not to Report"
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed tx
AND in Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND can also update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
BUT cannot edit any other part of the tx
AND edit does NOT exist for Club users

title: System will update a player's Roster Status when their MJ League Contract Reaches a Terms Confirmed State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a players MJ Roster status is "Active Pending Contract"
AND the MJ League Contract is moved from Ready for Signature to Pending Approval,  Ready for Signature to Ready for Signature, or Terms Submitted to Terms Confirmed
custom_steps: WHEN the player's latest Sign Free Agent transaction's Report Date is empty and the current date is in the baseball season, or the Report Date is after the effective date of the Sign Free Agent transaction
custom_expected: THEN set the Player's MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported and the transaction history record's Post MJ Roster Status to Not Yet Reported

title: System will create a new Sign to Major League Roster transaction for a player when their MJ League Contract Reaches a Terms Confirmed State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player current ORG = NUll
AND MJ Roster status is NOT "Active Pending Contract
custom_steps: WHEN a MJ League Contract is moved from Ready for Signature to Pending Approval, Ready for Signature to Ready for Signature, or Terms Submitted to Terms Confirmed
custom_expected:
THEN the system creates a Sign to Major League Roster transaction for the player
AND the "Sign to" matches the Signing Org from the contract
AND the Signing Date matches the Confirmed Terms Date from the contract (if this is not entered then use Signing Date)
AND the Report Date matches the Signing date from the contract
AND the transaction is automatically submitted to the BOC for approval

title: View an existing Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window in view mode

title: BOC user can create a new Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" is an option from the Create New menu
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" from the Create New will check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date.
custom_expected: THEN the system will load a new Preliminary tx

title: Club user can see Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) greyed out in the Create New map for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN selecting the option in the fourth level dropdown (Free Agency) "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) (BOC)"
custom_expected:
THEN the option will be greyed out
AND the user will not be allowed to select the option

title: Warning if attempting to create the tendered qualifying offer transaction for a player that does not have a recent Elect Free Agency - XX(B) transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have a submitted or approved elect free agency with a "Election Under Article" set to XXB with an election date within the past 5 days
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)"
custom_expected: THEN a warning message will display "Player does not have an Elect Free Agency – XX(B) within 5 days."

title: Submit a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit to BOC button
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND player's Player History: Code = TQXOB, Description = Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3), From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields in green font
AND an approval item will display on the BOC Admin's Approvals widget

title: Error if the player has a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) for a pending transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
AND the assignment date  is before the latest pending transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if the player has a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) for an approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
AND the assignment date  is before the latest approved transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if back or future dated Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)'s assignment date is more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps:
WHEN the assignment date is back or future dated more than 10 days
AND clicking submit or approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND on an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)"
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can View and Print all MJ tx in all states
AND view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions
BUT a BOC Basic users can only view, print, and see flags

title: Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (ADMIN)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB ADMIN
AND on an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view and print all major league transactions in all states of their own Org/Club
AND can view all approved MJ tx, including other clubs 
AND can NOT create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT cannot view transaction in a suppressed state
AND cannot view "BOC Notes" field
AND cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (BASIC)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB BASIC
AND on an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all MJ tx in all states, when logged in Org matches the "From Org"
BUT cannot see suppressed tx
AND cannot edit or change tx
AND cannot see "BOC Notes" field

title: As a BOC can approve a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an " Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx 
AND is in view or edit mode in a state of Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to "Approved"
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's MJR or MNR status is set to Free Agent
AND the player's Org and Club is set to Null

title: As a BOC cam reject a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx 
AND is in a state, Submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry.

title: BOC Approver will receive an error if attempting to approve a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction with an assignment date after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC Approver
AND there is an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
AND the assignment date is after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Approve"
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."

title: BOC user can reverse a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN a reverse notification will display
AND the tx status will update to "Reversed"
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: BOC user can suppress a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an  Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx in a Reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will be suppress
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: BOC user can reverse and suppress a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is an elect Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse and Suppress
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will first reverse, and then be suppressed
AND the tx will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches, and any other place where it is visible on UI

title: Delete a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" tx
AND is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
custom_steps:
WHEN the tx is in EDIT mode 
AND clicking "Delete"
custom_expected:
THEN the form should be closed and no record of the form should be kept
AND the user will be returned to the entry point of the tx

title: Club user will receive a notification when a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN a Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification when the transaction is updated
AND the Description will be a hyperlink to the tx

title: Edit an existing Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) transaction for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking edit
custom_expected:
THEN the tx will reload in edit mode
AND in Preliminary and Reject states the user will be able to edit all portions of the form
AND BOC is able to edit all fields in all states except for Approved and Reversed tx
AND in Approved and Reversed transactions, edit only gives BOC access to attach new files or edit existing attachments
AND can also update "Comments" and "BOC Notes" fields
BUT cannot edit any other part of the tx

title: View an existing Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the tx in a player's Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window in view mode

title: Create a new Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Tendered Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" is an option from the Create New menu
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" from the Create New will check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date
custom_expected: THEN the system will load a new Preliminary tx

title: Club user will be prevented from initiating a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction for a player that does not belong to the users Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a club user
custom_steps:
WHEN attempting to select "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" on the Create New menu for a player from their Player History 
AND the player's Current Org is not set to the Org of the initiating user.
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."

title: Error if attempting to create a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction for a player that is not on a roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a club user
AND player does not belong to any club
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)"
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: User will be prevented from initiating a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction for a player that does not belong to a MJ Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is not currently a Major League Player
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" on the Create New menu for a player from their Player History
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "This transaction is for Major League players only."

title: Submit a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" Transaction has been created
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the system will set the player's pending Org and Club to NULL
AND the system will set the player's pending Major League Rosters status to "Free Agent"

title: Error if creating a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) for a player who has a pending transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
AND the assignment date is before the latest pending transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if creating a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) for a player who has an approved transaction after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has created a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
AND the assignment date is before the latest approved transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if back or future dated a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)'s assignment date more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_steps:
WHEN the assignment date is back or future dated more than 10 days
AND clicking submit or approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) Permissions - BOC - Major Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND on an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)"
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can View and Print all MJ tx in all states
AND view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND can Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions
BUT a BOC Basic users can only view, print, and see flags

title: Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (ADMIN)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB ADMIN
AND on an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN the user can view and print all major league transactions in all states of their own Org/Club
AND can view all approved MJ tx, including other clubs 
AND can create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT cannot view transaction in a suppressed state
AND cannot view "BOC Notes" field
AND cannot see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) Permissions - Club - Major Transactions (BASIC)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a CLUB BASIC
AND on an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx
custom_steps: WHEN interacting with the "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print all MJ tx in all states, when logged in Org matches the "From Org"
BUT cannot see suppressed tx
AND cannot edit or change tx
AND cannot see "BOC Notes" field

title: BOC user can approve a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an " Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx

custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to "Approved"
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's MJR or MNR status is set to Free Agent
AND the player's Org and Club is set to Null

custom_expected:

AND reverse player's Pending org and club, pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry.

custom_steps: WHEN a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) tx is approved, rejected or reversed
custom_expected:

title: BOC user approving a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) will terminate a player's major league contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN approving Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_expected:
THEN player's current major league contract will terminate
AND player's current major contract status updates to 'Terminated'
AND an automatic comment generated on the contract (should not overwrite existing text but add to existing text). ""Terminated by [username] on [date, time stamp] via [transaction name]"

title: BOC user reversing a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction will un-terminate any major league contracts that were terminated
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN reversing an approved Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)  tx
custom_expected:
THEN it will "unterminate" any major league contract that was marked Termianted as a result of the approval of the tx
AND the state of the major league contract will be returned to its previous state

custom_expected: THEN the system will load a new Preliminary tx

title: Club user will see Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) greyed out in the Create New map for a player from their Player History

custom_steps: WHEN selecting the option in the fourth level dropdown (Free Agency) "Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)"
custom_expected:
THEN the option will be greyed out
AND the user will not be allowed to select the option

title: Warning if attempting to create the accepted qualifying offer transaction for a player that does not have a recent Elect Free Agency - XX(B) transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player does not have an approved or submitted Elect Free Agency with a "Election Under Article" set to XXB with an Election Date within the past 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" from the Create New menu
custom_expected: THEN a warning will display "Player does not have an Elect Free Agency – XX(B) within 10 days."

title: Error if back or future dated an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)'s assignment date more than 10 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps:
WHEN the assignment date is back or future dated more than 10 days
AND clicking submit or approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Assignment Date must be within 10 days of submission."

title: Error if creating an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) for a player that has a pending transaction after the entered assignment date

custom_steps:

AND the assignment date is before the latest pending transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if creating an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) for a player that has a approved transaction after the entered assignment date

custom_steps:

AND the assignment date is before the latest pending transaction date for the player
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "A transaction cannot occur before the date of player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."

title: Error if the Org on an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)'s doesn't match the player's recent Elect Free Agency Org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN if there is an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
AND the Elected From Org does not matches the Elected From Org on the player's most recent Elect Free Agency tx with "Election Under Article" set to XXB.
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Submit or Approve
custom_expected: THEN an error will display "Player may only be tendered a qualifying offer by his most recent Organization"

title: Submit an Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an "Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)" Transaction has been created
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the player's Player History: Code = AQXOB, Description = Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3), From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields in green font
AND a approval item will be generated
